Uses of Class
org.omancode.r.RFace

  • Packages that use RFace 
    Package Description
    org.omancode.r
    High level R interface for Java that extends REngine.
    org.omancode.r.ui
    R user interface elements including: A Swing console with a command history. A JTree representing objects in the R environment. A interface for UIs that gather input from the user and execute an R command.

    • Uses of RFace in org.omancode.r

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static RFace RFace.getInstance(RMainLoopCallbacks rloopHandler)
      Return the singleton instance of RInterfaceHL.

      Constructors in org.omancode.r.ui with parameters of type RFace 
      Constructor and Description
      RObjectTreeBuilder(RFace rInterface)
      Construct a RObjectTreeBuilder from the set of all objects present at time of construction in the R global environment.
      RObjectTreeBuilder(RFace rInterface, String dataframe, String includeClass)
      Construct a RObjectTreeBuilder from a dataframe or the set of objects present at time of construction in the R global environment.

      Construct a RObjectTreeBuilder from a dataframe or the set of objects present at time of construction in the R global environment.
